physical_appearance: This is a shaving razor. It consists of a retractable blade, with a black handle. It comes with a black casing. The razor is quite rusty. The black case has engraved lines along the edges as a decorative design. The case is chipped and scratched along the surface, especially at the top right corner.
sgcool_label_text: A shaving razor from the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
title_text: A shaving razor from a P.O.W archive (3 parts)  Shaving razor
subject_terms_2: World War, 1939-1945 Personal belongings Razor blades
context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
